name: NU_LegionellosisTestsForLegionellaSpeciesInSpecimenFromNormallySterileSiteByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: NU_Legionellosis (Tests for Legionella species in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Legionella species organisms in sterile specimens),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Legionella culture/isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: Non sterile specimens excluded: Urine/ Sputum/ Unspecified specimens)
